job.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
job.description:
Role Description
This is a part-time remote role for a Senior Full Stack Developer at PinchForth. The Senior Full Stack Developer will be responsible for developing and improving web applications in coordination with the front-end development team and contributing to software design decisions. They will also be responsible for guiding and mentoring junior developers in the team and cooperating with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities and provide customized solutions.


Key Responsibilities:
Lead and mentor development teams, fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment.
Spearhead critical thinking initiatives and tackle complex problems with precision and expertise.
Architect and maintain enterprise-level applications, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance.
Utilize DevOps principles to streamline development processes and enhance deployment pipelines.
Oversee server management and optimization, ensuring seamless operation and performance.
Drive continuous learning and improvement within the development team, staying abreast of industry trends and best practices.
Passionately code and develop innovative solutions to address business challenges and opportunities.


Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or related field
Experience with multiple programming languages such as C#, JavaScript, or Python
Proven experience with .NET, Node.js, or PHP and related web frameworks such as ASP.NET Core, Express, or Laravel
Experience with front-end web development tools including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, React, or Vue.js
Experience with Database Management, specifically SQL and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
Strong knowledge of Agile methodologies, software design patterns, and software deployment strategies
Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to identify and troubleshoot complex problems
Ability to work in a team environment and mentor junior developers to promote growth and skills development
Extensive Experience: A minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in full-stack development, with a strong background in both front-end and back-end technologies.
Leadership Skills: Proven experience in leading development teams and driving successful projects to completion.
Enterprise-level Experience: Demonstrated expertise in working on large-scale enterprise applications, with a focus on scalability, reliability, and security.
DevOps Knowledge: Proficiency in DevOps practices and tools, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure as code.
Server Management: Experience in managing and optimizing servers, ensuring optimal performance and uptime.
Passion for Coding: A deep passion for coding and software development, with a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.
Strong Communication: Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Full Stack Developer for a project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. The ideal candidate should possess expertise in web development, HTML, HubSpot, Webflow, CSS, Shopify, JavaScript, API integration, web application development, and WordPress.

Your primary responsibility will be to develop and maintain web applications, ensuring seamless integration and functionality across different platforms. You will work closely with our team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality code that meets client expectations. 

To apply, please submit a proposal that outlines your experience and expertise in the required skills. Additionally, provide links to past completed projects that demonstrate your ability to successfully deliver similar assignments. We are looking for candidates who can bring innovative solutions to the table and deliver exceptional results within the given timeframe.
